name: GoZen Forms
author: GozenHQ

sections.description:
Gozen Forms simplifies the data collection process. Simply select a form template or create one from scratch, modify questions, and share

and analyse responses in no time.

If you don’t have a Gozen Forms account yet, you can signup for a FREE trial here.

This plugin allows you to integrate your WordPress site with your Gozen Forms account

What is included in the Gozen Forms WordPress plugin – at a glance Create Stunning Forms

Choose from over 140+ industry-specific forms, that cover essentially all use cases for every sector. So all you have to do now is choose your industry and what kind of forms you want, then modify the questions and publish with a few simple clicks.

Customize your forms very easily

You can choose from premade themes in the theme gallery, or you can create your own form designs by adding your theme, editing the font, changing the text colors, or adding background images. Once you’re happy with the designs, you can save your theme as new. You can upload your own image or use our Unsplash image library.

Share your forms easily

Share your forms across multiple platforms and collect data via unique links. Add forms to your website using various embedding options, or send forms via email.

Form builder

Our no-code form builder lets you create dynamic and interactive forms. Choose more than 20 different types of fields. You can check your responses. on the go. Customize the form view to your liking, from a single page to a multi-page.

Types Of Questions To Choose From

  • Welcome Screen

  • Text

  • Paragraph

  • Email

  • Phone Number

  • Multiple Choice

  • Dropdown

  • Rating

  • Date

  • Number

  • Yes/No

  • WebSite

  • File Upload

  • Thankyou Screen

Form Layout Type

  • Single Pages

  • Slides

Skip Logics

Speed up form filling process and land respondents to the right questions based on a user’s previous answers

Analyse Responses

Get all of the insights you need on a single dashboard, from form submission rate to total views to engagement rate. All of the information is available with a single click.

Connect with your favourite apps

Setting up the integration is simple. Simply search for your favorite applications, click the connect button, and follow the on-screen instructions. Once you’ve activated the link, you’re done

Available integrations

  • Google sheet

  • Mailchimp Pabbly

  • ActiveCampaign

  • Integromat

  • Zapier

  • Custom

  • WebHook

  • Hubspot

  • Slack

  • Discord

  • Tray.io

  • Sendgrid

  • Mailer lite

  • Campaign Monitor

  • ConvertKit

  • Klaviyo

  • Constant Contact

  • SalesForce

  • Zoho

  • keap

  • Zendesk

  • mailerCloud

  • vbout

  • acumbamail
sections.reviews:
Gozen Forms: A Great Form Builder App

By nikhillab on September 13, 2023

I was searching for a nice Gorm Building app from many months and I got it. It is Gozen Forms. It is very nice app. We can create variety of forms, important thing is we can prepare forms with nice graphics, we can set logic, can do marking system, accept the payments. I'm very glad that I have subscribed for Gozen Forms.

Amazing alternative to typeform

By dawndesman on September 4, 2023

Have been waiting for a worthy alternative to typeform for years. Now its here.

Does everything the big players does, has live support and improves faster.

If anyone is on the fence, I recommend giving it a try. I use it every day for my team an I.

Effortless Form Building

By elixirdsgn on July 21, 2023

I have used GoZen Forms for a while now, and I must say, it exceeds my expectations. I've been able to integrate it into my websites in white-labelled format, and the logic lets me create advanced forms for my use cases. This easily replaces TypeForm at a good price. The interface is beautifully designed, making the whole form-building process a pleasant experience. They recently added an AI feature that creates for you a form once you describe it…Magical!!

Fresh take on making professional forms with intuitive UI & affordability

By immanual on January 11, 2023

What do you like best?
I like the UI very much. A lot of themes and templates to select from if you don’t know where to start.
Easy to set up.
There is an option to add videos to forms. However, I haven’t tried it out.

What do you dislike?
Setting up the logic for the form is a bit different than the other tools I used. There is a learning curve.
They don’t support using personalization in the Endings as of now.

What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a startup, affordable pricing is critical.
Doesn’t require top-tier skills to set this up, as the UI is very user-friendly.

The best form for anything in Wordpress

By movaram on January 4, 2023

Great design, easy to use and afordable. It sounds so simple but I could not find any other form that combines them all. Also great integrations that is so vital in our email campaignsAlso,affordable, but

Easy Form Builder

By zuluranger on December 15, 2022

I like Gozen Forms' minimalist interface. It is simple to use. Just point and click. Instead the common question field, you can choose various options for each step. And you can also customize each step. Gozen Forms makes it easy to create questionaires, polls, surveys and even quizzes.

the best forms, surveys, and quizzes tools ever.

By odigitall on October 6, 2022

GoZen Forms is an amazing product! It's so easy to use and it's really versatile. I've used it for everything from creating simple forms to surveys and quizzes. It's really helped me streamline my workflows and get more organized. Highly recommend!

Best alternative to Typeform for WordPress websites

By sathishluvsatz on July 14, 2022

Gozen Forms plugin helped me create and manage forms right from an intuitive SaaS dashboard without overloading my WordPress website. I have created custom forms and also used their readymade templates. It saves me a lot of hours indeed. I was not satisfied with the free 10 responses provided by Typeform. So I checked alternative platforms to receive responses from my niche audiences. Gozen Forms is similar to Typeform and is reliable for my niche blogs. Their form questions and layouts were impressive. The plugin is easy to use, and you can add fields, provide conditional logic, change the order and customize the look & feel of your forms. Plus, the plugin integrates with a variety of other platforms, including Google Sheet, Zapier, WebHook, Slack and more. I'm enjoying it.
